author: Cool Worlds
description:
For 72 hours, enjoy 15% OFF on all Hoverpens with code COOLWORLDS, or click on the link https://noviumdesign.shop/CoolWorlds - Free shipping to most countries. Also on Amazon: https://noviumdesign.shop/1HrMzs

What is the most realistic way we'll detect an alien civilization? If the history of science and astronomy is any guide, there is a clear answer: The Eschatian Hypothesis.

Written & presented by David Kipping

→ Support our research: https://www.coolworldslab.com/support

title: Our First Contact with Aliens Will Be Their Last Words
